item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: It appears that Prince George of Cambridge is the first person ever to have a Wikipedia article started before he was born (opened June 27).

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: I'm thrilled by the once-in-a-generation news of the birth of an heir to our throne. Better yet, it happened on my niece's 20th birthday!

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Spent an amazing weekend with friends, boating & fishing on Mississippi Lake. In July, there really is no place like home!

item.title: Mentioned by EMC Smiths Falls
item.description:
Where does reid stand on wasteful mailings?
Will Lanark, Frontenac, Lennox and Addington MP Scott Reid sink to that level? The answer is in the mail. By now you've probably seen the TV commercials. In them, the Conservatives use out-of-context fabrications and falsehoods to try to smear the new ...

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
This just in: Tory MP Reid's annual craft beer-tasting, cheese pairing party a hit ...
Conservative MP Scott Reid hosted his 10th annual popular craft beer tasting in room 216-N Centre Block last Wednesday. More than 100 Parliamentarians and staffers got to sip on some of Canada's best micro-brewed and artisanal beers during one of the ...
